ARABIC: إِنَّا مَكَّنَّا لَهُۥ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَءَاتَيْنَٰهُ مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ سَبَبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We gave him power and authority on the earth and granted him a way to everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "I will cite before you his commemoration." We gave him authority in the land and means of accomplishing every end.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: We granted him power in the land and endowed him with all kinds of resources.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We had given him great power in the land and all kinds of resources.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed We gave him authority in the land and bestowed him the means of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, We established him in the earth, and We gave him the means of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely We established him in the land and granted him means of access to every thing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We established him in the land, and We gave him a way to everything;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! We made him strong in the land and gave him unto every thing a road.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We established him in the land, and gave him the means to achieve all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily We! We established him in the earth, and vouchsafed unto him of everything a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed We had granted him power in the land and given him the means to all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily We established his power on earth, and We gave him the ways and the means to all ends.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, We established him in the earth, and We gave him the means of everything.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We established him in the land and gave him means to all things.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We established him on earth, and gave him all kinds of means.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed We established him upon the earth, and We gave him to everything a way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [18:84] Indeed We empowered him throughout the land, by facilitating [for him] the journeying therein, and We gave him to everything, of which one might have need, a way, a route to lead him to that which he sought.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! We made him strong in the land and gave unto every thing a road) the knowledge of the roads and constellation.
